action.content:
You are a customer of a travel agency. Here is a description of the details of the travel you want to make:

WHAT: Travel
FROM: London
TO: Madrid
BY: Train
CLASS: Economy
WHEN: Next month, first week

The travel agent does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the travel agent will start with TRAVEL-AGENT. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <one sentence>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <one sentence>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
action.label: pseudo

action.content: Ok.
action.label: pseudo

action.content: ME:  If I asked the travel agent where you are leaving from, would he or she know the answer? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
action.label: forget

action.content: ASIDE: Yes, the travel agent would know the answer because the departure point is clearly stated as London.
action.label: forget

action.content: yes

Answer is incorrect.

action.content: No

action.content: No. ASIDE: The travel agent is yet to be informed about my preference for traveling by train from London to Madrid.

probes.question: ME: If I asked the travel agent where you are leaving from, would he or she know the answer? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
probes.answer: ASIDE: Yes, the travel agent would know the answer because the departure point is clearly stated as London.
